results.name: Array T(k,n), read by antidiagonals: T(k,n) = ((k+1)^(n+1)-(-k)^(n+1))/(2k+1).
comment: Square array of solutions of a family of recurrences.
Rows of the array give solutions to the recurrences a(n)=a(n-1)+k(k-1)a(n-2), a(0)=a(1)=1.
Subarray of array in A072024. - _Philippe Deléham_, Nov 24 2013
link: Andrew Howroyd, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1274
formula: Rows of the array have g.f. 1/((1+kx)(1-(k+1)x)).
program: print([T(n - k, k) for k in range(n + 1)]) # _Indranil Ghosh_, Mar 27 2017
results.author: _Paul Barry_, Mar 17 2003
